comment._content: Lieutenant Colonel Lewis E. Goodier, Sr., Judge Advocate General of the Western Department in San Francisco In 1915, he was court-martialed. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aviation_Section,_U.S._Signal_Corps... see also: Honolulu star-bulletin., September 10, 1915, 2:30 Edition, Page 1: SON INJURED, FATHER FACES COURT-MARTIAL
